meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to go by; to go past; to go along; to travel along; to pass through; to use (a road); to take (a route); to go via; to go by way of 私は毎日その教会の前を通る。I go by that church every day.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to run (between; of a rail service, bus route, etc.); to operate (between); to connect 駅と飛行機の間は、バスが通っている。Buses run between the station and the airport.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to go indoors; to go into a room; to be admitted; to be shown in; to be ushered in; to come in

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to penetrate; to pierce; to skewer; to go through; to come through 弾がヘルメットを通った。A bullet pierced the helmet.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 5. to permeate; to soak into; to spread throughout

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 6. to carry (e.g. of a voice); to reach far ケリーの声は、よく通る。Kelly's voice carries well.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 7. to be passed on (e.g. of a customer's order to the kitchen); to be relayed; to be conveyed

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 8. to pass (a test, a bill in the House, etc.); to be approved; to be accepted 容易に試験に通ると思う。I expect her to pass the examination easily.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 9. to go by (a name); to be known as; to be accepted as; to have a reputation for 彼女はベスという名で通っていた。She went by the name of Bess.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 10. to be coherent; to be logical; to be reasonable; to be comprehensible; to be understandable; to make sense そういう言い訳はとおらない。That's no excuse.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 11. to get across (e.g. of one's point); to be understood 黙っていて心が通った。There was no need for verbal communication.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 12. to pass for; to come across as; to seem like この絵は本物で通るだろう。This painting will pass for genuine.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 13. to be straight (e.g. wood grain)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 14. to be well-informed; to be wise Archaic

meanings.type: Suffix, Godan verb with 'ru' ending
meanings.meaning: 15. to do ... completely; to do ... thoroughly after the -masu stem of a verb

meanings.type: Other forms
meanings.meaning: 徹る 【とおる】、透る 【とおる】

sentences.translation: I go by that church every day.
Buses run between the station and the airport.
I expect her to pass the examination easily.
She went by the name of Bess.
There was no need for verbal communication.
This painting will pass for genuine.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to stick through; to force through その子はどうしても自分のわがままを通そうとしている。The boy will have his own way.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to spread throughout; to thoroughly diffuse

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to make a path between two points

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to proceed in a logical manner See also 筋を通す すじをとおす

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 5. to let pass; to allow through

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 6. to lead (someone) into (a house, room, etc.); to show in

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 7. to go through (a middleman)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 8. to (look, listen) through (a window, wall, etc.)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 9. to pass (a law, applicant, etc.) 参議院はどんな改正案も通さなくても構わないようです。The Upper House seems bent on defeating any reform bills.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 10. to force to accept; to force agreement

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 11. to continue (in a state); to persist in

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 12. to do to the entirety of; to cover all of; to span the whole ...

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 13. to do from beginning to end without a break in the form とおして…する

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 14. to convey (one's ideas, etc.) to the other party

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 15. to do to the end; to carry through; to complete after the -te form of a verb

meanings.type: Other forms
meanings.meaning: 徹す 【とおす】、透す 【とおす】

meanings.type: Suru verb - special class, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to penetrate; to sink in

meanings.type: Suru verb - special class, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to devote oneself (to); to do intently and exclusively 大学出たての新人は資料を作ったり、コピーをとったりと裏方仕事に徹するのだろうと、勝手に想像していたのですが見事に裏切られました。I had imagined that the newbies fresh from university would probably be stuck with all the backstage work - collecting reference material, getting copies and such but I couldn't have been proved more wrong.

meanings.type: Suru verb - special class, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to do throughout (e.g. the night) 夜を徹するか否か。Should I stay up all night or not?

meanings.type: Ichidan verb, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to respond; to answer; to meet (e.g. demands, expectations) Only applies to 応える, Only applies to 報えるあなたは御両親の期待に応えるべきだ。You ought to live up to your parents' hopes.

meanings.type: Ichidan verb, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to affect; to take a toll; to strike home; to have an effect on; to be hard on someone (e.g. heat, cold, work, illness, etc.); to be a strain See also 堪える, sometimes 堪えるそれは彼の身に応えだした。It is beginning to tell on him.

meanings.type: Other forms
meanings.meaning: 報える 【こたえる】、徹える 【こたえる】

meanings.type: Ichidan verb, Intransitive verb
